Class GlobalDatabaseExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.example.goatTutorats.exceptions.GlobalDatabaseExceptionHandler
@ControllerAdvice public class GlobalDatabaseExceptionHandler extends Object
Global exception handler for database-related exceptions.
